channel.title: mongodb on Keep Calm and Carry On Coding
channel.description: Recent content in mongodb on Keep Calm and Carry On Coding

item.title: Installaion Guide of MongoDB on MAC
item.description: Installaion Guide of MongoDB on MAC Guide on the Official Website brew tap mongodb/brew brew install mongo mongod --config /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf Alternatively, to run MongoDB as a macOS service, issue the following (the process uses the /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf file, created during the install): brew services start mongodb-community@4.0 MongoDB GUI: Robo 3T http://robomongo.org
